name: AppCraft Project
summary: Learn about .ACZ files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: AppCraft is used to teach users, often kids, programming skills. The application lets users develop their own applications, which can be exported as an ACZ file, to share with others.
To create an ACZ file, select Export, which is located on the bottom bar of the project window. Then, name your file and select "Make .acz."
NOTE: AppCraft has been renamed as CodingKids.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
